action.des: Pitching Change: Rex Brothers replaces Josh Roenicke, batting 6th.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter A. J. Pollock replaces Bryan Shaw.

atbat.des: A. J. Pollock grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.
atbat.des_es: A. J. Pollock batea rodado de out, campo corto Troy Tulowitzki a primera base Todd Helton.

pitch.cc: Rex Brothers got A.J. Pollock to chase a four-seam fastball; Pollock is hitting .000 against them in that location this season compared to .229 overall.

atbat.des_es: Gerardo Parra recibe base por bolas.

action.des: With Willie Bloomquist batting, wild pitch by Rex Brothers, Gerardo Parra to 2nd.

atbat.des: Willie Bloomquist singles on a line drive to right fielder Michael Cuddyer. Gerardo Parra scores.
atbat.des_es: Willie Bloomquist pega sencillo con línea a jardinero derecho Michael Cuddyer. Gerardo Parra anota.

action.des: With Justin Upton batting, Willie Bloomquist steals (4) 2nd base.

atbat.des: Rex Brothers intentionally walks Justin Upton.
atbat.des_es: Rex Brothers recibe base por bolas intencional Justin Upton.

atbat.des: Jason Kubel singles on a ground ball to right fielder Michael Cuddyer. Willie Bloomquist scores. Justin Upton to 3rd.
atbat.des_es: Jason Kubel pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero derecho Michael Cuddyer. Willie Bloomquist anota Justin Upton a 3ra.

action.des: Pitching Change: Esmil Rogers replaces Rex Brothers, batting 2nd.
Defensive Substitution: Jonathan Herrera replaces pitcher Rex Brothers, batting 6th, playing third base.

atbat.des: Paul Goldschmidt singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Gonzalez. Justin Upton scores. Jason Kubel to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Paul Goldschmidt pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero izquierdo Carlos Gonzalez. Justin Upton anota Jason Kubel a 2da.

atbat.des: Ryan Roberts singles on a ground ball to left fielder Carlos Gonzalez. Jason Kubel scores. Paul Goldschmidt to 3rd. Ryan Roberts to 2nd on the throw.
atbat.des_es: Ryan Roberts pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero izquierdo Carlos Gonzalez. Jason Kubel anota Paul Goldschmidt a 3ra. Ryan Roberts a 2da con el tiro.

atbat.des: Aaron Hill flies out to right fielder Michael Cuddyer.
atbat.des_es: Aaron Hill batea elevado de out a jardinero derecho Michael Cuddyer.

action.des: Pitching Change: David Hernandez replaces Bryan Shaw, batting 5th, replacing left fielder Jason Kubel.
A. J. Pollock remains in the game as the left fielder.

atbat.des: Carlos Gonzalez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
atbat.des_es: Carlos Gonzalez pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero central Gerardo Parra.

atbat.des: Troy Tulowitzki pops out to shortstop Willie Bloomquist.
atbat.des_es: Troy Tulowitzki batea elevadito de out a campo corto Willie Bloomquist.

atbat.des: Todd Helton walks. Carlos Gonzalez to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Todd Helton recibe base por bolas. Carlos Gonzalez a 2da.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jason Giambi replaces Jonathan Herrera.

atbat.des: Jason Giambi singles on a soft ground ball to shortstop Willie Bloomquist. Carlos Gonzalez to 3rd. Todd Helton to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Jason Giambi pega sencillo con rodado suave a campo corto Willie Bloomquist. Carlos Gonzalez a 3ra. Todd Helton a 2da.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch-runner Eric Young replaces Jason Giambi.

atbat.des: Ramon Hernandez flies out to center fielder Gerardo Parra.
atbat.des_es: Ramon Hernandez batea elevado de out a jardinero central Gerardo Parra.

atbat.des: Dexter Fowler walks. Carlos Gonzalez scores. Todd Helton to 3rd. Eric Young to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Dexter Fowler recibe base por bolas. Carlos Gonzalez anota Todd Helton a 3ra. Eric Young a 2da.

atbat.des: Michael Cuddyer reaches on a fielding error by third baseman Ryan Roberts. Todd Helton scores. Eric Young to 3rd. Dexter Fowler to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Michael Cuddyer se embasa por error en fildeo de tercera base Ryan Roberts. Todd Helton anota Eric Young a 3ra. Dexter Fowler a 2da.

atbat.des: Marco Scutaro walks. Eric Young scores. Dexter Fowler to 3rd. Michael Cuddyer to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Marco Scutaro recibe base por bolas. Eric Young anota Dexter Fowler a 3ra. Michael Cuddyer a 2da.

pitch.cc: David Hernandez showed faith in Miguel Montero by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Wilin Rosario replaces Esmil Rogers.
Pitching Change: Brad Ziegler replaces David Hernandez, batting 5th.

atbat.des: Wilin Rosario lines out to right fielder Justin Upton.
atbat.des_es: Wilin Rosario batea línea de out a jardinero derecho Justin Upton.
